variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.description: A1. Identifying information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: NEA4
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Gender

variable.name: NEB1
variable.description: B1. Attempt to contact. Clinic attempt to contact the patient

variable.name: NEB2
variable.description: B2. Attempt to contact. Did the clinic talk to the patient

variable.name: NEC1
variable.description: C1. Vital and complication status. Is the patient living

variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID
